service.name: Restylane

seo.title: Restylane® Filler in Westfield & Carmel, IN | RELUXE Med Spa
seo.description: Restylane® family of fillers for structure, definition, and support. Wide range of indications with beautiful, natural outcomes.

overview.p1: Restylane® offers structured HA gels that can sculpt, support, and smooth with precision.
overview.p2: We lean on Restylane in areas that need definition—like jawline or chin—while keeping edges soft and believable.

whyReluxe.title: Sculpt with restraint
whyReluxe.body: Structured support without harsh angles or bulk.

whyReluxe.title: Tailored textures
whyReluxe.body: Choose Restylane gels to match firmness and lift needs.

whyReluxe.title: Measured artistry
whyReluxe.body: Millimeter-minded placements for symmetry and balance.

service.tagline: Trusted HA fillers for shape and support.

howItWorks.title: Consultation
howItWorks.body: We review your goals, history, and design a personalized plan.

howItWorks.title: Treatment
howItWorks.body: Quick, precise session performed by our experts.

howItWorks.title: Aftercare
howItWorks.body: Simple steps for best results. We check in with you.

faq.a: Most patients describe mild, brief discomfort. We can use numbing when appropriate.
Some results are immediate; full effect often appears by 1–2 weeks depending on service.
